title: Detection of intracellular microRNA-21 for cancer diagnosis by a nanosystem containing a ZnO@polydopamine and DNAzyme probe
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13351-13360
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00636D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuanyuan Liu, Ranran Wang, Fengxia Zhang, Yongshan Ma, Tianyi Jiang
The novel nanosystem composed of ZnO@polydopamine nanomaterial and deoxyribozyme probe can be applied for ratiometric fluorescence assay for microRNA-21, which is helpful for cancer diagnosis and prognosis.
